pButton.Name: Logos
pButton.popInfo: This is an appeal to logos. By establishing the date, Roosevelt uses a hard and fast time. No one will question the veracity of the event that has occurred, which gives Roosevelt instant credibility.

pButton.Name: Pathos
pButton.popInfo: The word “infamy” is a very value-laden word. This is an appeal to pathos. The infamous nature of the event should stir the audience to anger.

pButton.Name: Ethos
pButton.popInfo: This is an ethical appeal. It is fact-based, so it could also be considered a logical appeal. But the words “suddenly and deliberately” direct the reader’s attention to the idea that this is a premeditated act of aggression.
